# Intel® Xe Templates for Linear Algebra

This is the bare-bones version of Intel® Xe Templates for Linear Algebra (Intel® XeTLA) which only supports CM. If you want to contribute to XeTLA or use full version, please contact Yershov, Dmitry B.

## Security

See Intel's [Security Center](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/default.html)
for information on how to report a potential security issue or vulnerability.

See also: [Security Policy](/SECURITY.md)
